overview: The "good vibes only" freshman Mitsos, the "stuck with her parents" 25-year-old Sofia and the "no strings attached" 30-year-old Dimitra. A Saturday night when none knows if they’re ready for the next step.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

tagline: It' s ok not to be ready
title: ANTE NTE
